section.title: Controls
section.distingControl: X + Y + offset, or X + offset
X - Y + offset, or Y +/- offset

section.title: Parameters
section.distingParameter: When 1, Z offset is not quantized to 1v steps.
Sum mode. 0: A=X+Y+offset, B=X-Y-offset 1: A=X+offset, B=Y-offset 2: A=X+offset, B=Y+offset

section.title: Parameters
section.distingParameter: When 1, Z scale is not quantized to integer values

section.title: Controls
section.distingControl: mode. '-0' indicates independent mode, 0 indicates combined mode
abs(X) in independent mode abs(X + Y) in combined mode
abs(Y) in independent mode abs(X - Y) in combined mode

section.title: Description
section.text: Provides either full-wave rectifier, or absolute value function, depending on value of Z

section.title: Controls
section.distingControl: Gate. Above 2.5V, outputs follow inputs, Below -1.5V, outputs are frozen.

section.title: Controls
section.distingControl: Gate. Above 2.5V, outputs follow inputs, Below -1.5V, outputs are frozen.

section.title: Controls
section.distingControl: When Z is positive, acts as transpose When Z is negative, triggers quantizer to update output.

section.title: Parameters
section.distingParameter: Transpose mode. When 0, transposition occurs after quantization. When 1, transposition occurs before quantization.
Key. Adjusts root of quantization scale by semitones.
Time delay of B output gate.

section.title: Parameters
section.distingParameter: Mode. When 0, output A is updated when trigger input Y goes over 1V. When 1, output A follows X while input Y is over 1V.
Time delay between trigger and sampling.
Noise colour: 0: Violet 1: White 2: Pink 3: Red

section.title: Description
section.text: Pressing Z triggers a sample manually.

section.title: Controls
section.distingControl: V/oct pitch derived from X, plus Y

section.title: Controls
section.distingControl: dry + delay in ratio according to feedback

section.title: Parameters
section.distingParameter: Delay time multiplier, from 1/64 to x16

section.title: Parameters
section.distingParameter: waveform A. 0: triangle 1: sine 2: square 3: saw 4: sub-octave square
waveform B. Same list as above.

section.title: Parameters
section.distingParameter: output waveforms. 0: A=triangle/saw, B= square/pulse 1: A=triangle/saw, B=sub-octave square 2: A=square/pulse, B=sub octave square

section.title: Controls
section.distingControl: offset, in increments of 1/parameter of an octave

section.title: Parameters
section.distingParameter: Controls Z offset divisor, from 1/1 of an octave to 1/12 an octave(semitones).

algorithm.name: C3 Clockable Ping Pong Delay (Z feedback)

section.title: Parameters
section.distingParameter: Output mode. When 0, outputs are dry&wet mixed. When 1, outputs are only wet signal.

algorithm.name: C4 Clockable Ping Pong Delay (Z input pan)

section.title: Controls
section.distingControl: comparator out: +5V when A is above 0

section.title: Parameters
section.distingParameter: bit mangling mode. Bit swap, rotation, or XOR depending on value.

section.title: Parameters
section.distingParameter: output mode. 0: A mix, B delay only. 1: A & B are mix. 2: A & B are delay only.

section.title: Parameters
section.distingParameter: Scale. When -1, an envelope tracker is used so LFO amplitude matches input. Other values set LFO amplitude directly.

section.title: Parameters
section.distingParameter: Trigger Mode. When 0, acts as AR envelope, holding envelope high as long as trigger is high. When 1, executes one full A/D when gate goes high. When 2, loops A/D as long as the trigger is high.
Z mode. When 0, Z sweeps from short A&D -> short A, long D -> long A&D -> long A, short D When 1, sets A&D to same value.

section.title: Description
section.text: Push Z to manually trigger envelope

section.title: Parameters
section.distingParameter: Trigger Mode. When 0, acts as AR envelope, holding envelope high as long as trigger is high. When 1, executes one full A/D when gate goes high. When 2, loops A/D as long as the trigger is high.
Z mode. When 0, Z sweeps from short A&D -> short A, long D -> long A&D -> long A, short D When 1, sets A&D to same value.

section.title: Description
section.text: Push Z to manually trigger envelope

section.title: Parameters
section.distingParameter: Trigger Mode. When 0, acts as AR envelope, holding envelope high as long as trigger is high. When 1, executes one full A/D when gate goes high. When 2, loops A/D as long as the trigger is high.
Z mode. When 0, Z sweeps from short A&D -> short A, long D -> long A&D -> long A, short D When 1, sets A&D to same value.

section.title: Description
section.text: Push Z to manually trigger envelope

algorithm.name: F6 Shift Register Random Quantized CVs
F8 Shift Register Random Dual Triggers

section.title: Description
section.text: See manual for explanation how to set frequency with S and Z.

section.title: Parameters
section.distingParameter: Y mode. When 0, Y is unused and output starts when clock is present on X. When 1, output starts when Y goes high and stops when Y low.

section.title: Parameters
section.distingParameter: Microtonal Scale. -1 is disabled, see Scala Support in manual

section.title: Parameters
section.distingParameter: Gate delay. Used to let pitch CV settle before sampling when gate arrives.
Z mode. When 0, Z sets velocity. When 1, Z generates mod wheel.

section.title: Controls
section.distingControl: inverted mix of X&Y, according to Z. Or LFO output.

section.title: Parameters
section.distingParameter: Crossfade/pan law. 0: Equal gain 1: Equal power 2: DJ-style crossfade 3: FX Loop: A=unattenuated X + faded amount of Y
Clip mode. 0: Legacy, with digital overflows 1: Hard clip 2: Soft clip
Output B option/LFO speed. -1=input copy. 0 = disabled.

section.title: Parameters
section.distingParameter: Mode. 0: Output is a sample of input when trigger Z goes over 1V. 1: Output follows input while Z is high (track & hold)
Time delay between gate high and sampling.

section.title: Parameters
section.distingParameter: X scale/trigger mode. When negative, outputs only update on trigger.
Y scale/trigger mode. When negative, outputs only update on trigger.

section.title: Parameters
section.distingParameter: Sets Z control. 0: delay 1: length 2: Override (high) 3: Override (low) 4: Input enable 5: Input disabled 6: Z triggers both outputs

section.title: Controls
section.distingControl: interval between A & B, conforming to scale and key
trigger in or pitch CV input

section.title: Parameters
section.distingParameter: Key. Values follow circle of fifths
Trigger mode/offset/Y attenuation. When negative, Y is CV input attenuated by parameter. When positive, Y is trigger input and parameter sets pitch CV sampling delay

section.title: Description
section.text: Use playlist to set number of clocks per sample.

section.title: Parameters
section.distingParameter: Panning option. 0: A emits sample X, B emits sample Y 1: A/B act as L/R output of both samples.

section.title: Parameters
section.distingParameter: Panning option. 0: A emits sample X, B emits sample Y 1: A/B act as L/R output of both samples.
Selects which samples are affected by Z

section.title: Controls
section.distingControl: end position CV when negative, retrigger input when positive

section.title: Description
section.text: See manual for how to set up multisample playlists

section.title: Parameters
section.distingParameter: Gate mode. 0: X is gate, starting & stopping CV. 1: sample plays continuously 2: sample plays continuously, X is clock CV.

section.title: Parameters
section.distingParameter: Output B option/detune -3: squarewave 1 octave below A -2: Wavetable VCO one octave below output A -1: Wavetable VCO one octave above output A 0-99: Wavetable VCO detuned relative to output A; output A is also detuned in the opposite direction.

section.title: Description
section.text: See manual for wavetable SD card setup

section.title: Parameters
section.distingParameter: Time delay of B output gate

section.title: Parameters
section.distingParameter: Output type A. 0: ramp 1: triangle affected by ramp 2:sine affected by ramp 3:square affected by ramp 4:triangle 5:sine 6:square
Output type B. Same list as above.

section.title: Parameters
section.distingParameter: Output type A. 0: triangle 1: sine 2: square 3: rising ramp 4: falling ramp
Output type B. Same list as above.
Mode. 0: X/Y set LFO min/max. 1: X/Y set LFO center/amplitude.

section.title: Parameters
section.distingParameter: Output B logical operation. -2: B follows A -1: B is inverse of A 0: AND 1: OR 2: XOR 3: NAND 4: NOR 5: XNOR
